column3: This is a limited version of #220 that does not include the wallet import/export code; only key import/export/remove.\n

NACK for version 0.5 -- I think removeprivkey needs at least a warning that it can modify unrelated account balances, and maybe a dump of what it did to the wallet so there is some chance of an 'undo' if the wrong key is removed.\n
As per Gavin's request, removeprivkey is disabled for now.\n
